name: elan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a combination of style and energetic confidence or speed, especially in a performance or someone's behaviour: She dances the role with such élan. As a prime minister, she had a certain elan.
More examplesFewer examplesThe story moves along with élan.He dismissed the criticism with some elan, laughing it off.Everyone in the company can sing, dance and act with equal élan.The orchestra bring style and élan to this glorious music.Having won the Premiership title with such elan, the team put in a disappointingly muted performance today.
